name: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered Recreation (Reupload)
description:
Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered Recreation (Reupload) is an educational action game developed by SputnikBarz. It came out on 11-04-2023.
Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered Recreation (Reupload) is available on Linux, macOS and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
